"Good morning! Your alarm is going off now. Would you like me to turn it off for you?"
"It's time to get up! I'll set your alarm to snooze for 5 minutes, but after that it will go off again."
"Your alarm is ringing! Would you like me to read you a motivational quote to help you get out of bed?"
"It's time to start your day! I'll set your alarm to play your favorite song to help you wake up."
"Your alarm is going off! Would you like me to send a reminder to your phone to get up and start your day?"
